name: Emerald Peaks
description: A majestic mountain range dominated by towering peaks with a distinct green hue due to the unique flora. Home to the elusive griffons and offering breathtaking views, the peaks are a popular yet perilous destination for adventurers. Ancient Eldorian scripts suggest that the peaks were once used as a powerful nexus for arcane rituals.

name: Whispering Woods
description: An expansive, enchanting forest where the trees are said to whisper stories of the past to those who listen closely. Eldorian ruins scattered throughout the woods are guarded by ancient tree spirits, and it is believed that some of these stories contain secrets to unleashing the true potential of Flevia's magic.

name: Ruins of Eldoria
description: The remnants of the ancient civilization that once thrived in Flevia. These ruins are shrouded in mystery and are scattered across the land, each site bearing intricate carvings and mystical symbols. Scholars and treasure hunters explore these sites, hoping to uncover the lost knowledge of the Eldoria.

name: Crystal Streams
description: A network of pristine, crystal-clear waterways that crisscross Flevia. These streams are believed to carry the magical energies of the land, making them a vital resource for local spellcasters. The streams are also known for their healing properties and attract pilgrims seeking rejuvenation.

name: The Council Hall of Vellum
description: A grand hall located in the heart of Flevia where the Council of Vellum convenes. Made from the finest Eldorian stone and adorned with magical runes, the hall symbolizes the unity and cooperation among the races of Flevia. It serves as the center of governance and cultural affairs, hosting seasonal festivals and important diplomatic meetings.
